name: #LD28 - YOGOB
tagline: "You only got one Button" - Our Ludum Dare 28 entry
body:
# "You only got one Button"
***

YOGOB is an infinite runner made during Ludum Dare's game jam #28 within 48 hours.  
The goal is to run as far as possible before dying.

We had to cut many features under time pressure, but we still hope it's challenging.
## Download
* [Web Player](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/6106652/LD28/index.html)
* [Windows](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/6106652/LD28/YOGOB.zip)

## Credits

**Code**  
* Zerano  
* nyrrrr  

**Art**  
* nyrrrr  

**Special thanks**  
* Tommy Bulpa (Music)
